en: Supercharge Your Fitness. Stay Consistent. Get Results.
TenaPrime harnesses the power of AI and the expertise of human scientists to generate the best workout plan for you.

You must do 5 things to live better longer: stay active, eat right, sleep well, think positively, and make meaningful connections. Doing these things, day in and day out, means more time with friends, more time with children (and grandchildren), and more time to laugh and love. But actually doing these things can be so hard for so many of us.

That's where TenaPrime comes in. By making it FUN and REWARDING to build good habits, and by doing it as part of a supportive community with live sessions from TenaPrime wellness coaches and other experts and leading voices, we are here to help you live better. Our mission is to unlock 100 million additional healthy years for people like you over the next decade. It all starts with you having more time to be you.
Choose from hundreds of workouts, healthy recipes, relaxing meditations, and expert articles, for a whole body and mind approach to feeling great.
